sentences.en: "Shouldn't you be at work today?" — "I called in sick."
sentences.cn: “你今天不是应该上班的吗？”“我打电话请过病假了。”

sentences.en: a sick animal
sentences.cn: 患病的动物

sentences.en: a sick child
sentences.cn: 生病的孩子

sentences.en: All the years he was sick my mother had nursed him.
sentences.cn: 他生病的这些年来，我妈妈一直照料着他。

sentences.en: Are you all right? You look terrible. Are you sick?
sentences.cn: 你没事儿吧？你的脸色很难看，生病了吗？

sentences.en: He felt sick and dizzy and then passed out.
sentences.cn: 他感到恶心、眩晕，然后就昏了过去。

sentences.en: He got sick of hanging around waiting for me.
sentences.cn: 他等我都等烦了。

sentences.en: He took sick (= became ill ) and died a week later.
sentences.cn: 他病倒后一周就去世了。

sentences.en: He was too sick to travel to his son's side.
sentences.cn: 他病得厉害，不能赶到他儿子身边了。

sentences.en: He was worried sick about what our mothers would say.
sentences.cn: 对于我们双方的母亲会说什么他十分担心。

sentences.en: His mother’s very sick.
sentences.cn: 他母亲病得很重。

sentences.en: I am sick and tired of all the criticism.
sentences.cn: 我无法容忍这些批评。

sentences.en: I felt sick to my stomach with sadness for them.
sentences.cn: 我为他们感到十分痛心。

sentences.en: I get sick of being thought of as a political automaton.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌被看作政治机器。

sentences.en: I'm sick of reading headlines involving the Kennedys in sex scandals.
sentences.cn: 关于肯尼迪家族性丑闻的新闻标题都让我读得腻烦了。

sentences.en: It makes me sick that people commit offences and never get punished.
sentences.cn: 一些人屡屡犯罪却从未受到惩戒，这真让我气愤。

sentences.en: Maria can’t come in today because she’s sick.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚因为生病今天不能来了。

sentences.en: Pete’s at home in bed, sick as a dog (= very sick ) .
sentences.cn: 皮特卧床在家，病得很重。

sentences.en: She got up and was sick in the handbasin.
sentences.cn: 她起身在洗手池里吐了起来。

sentences.en: she was &B{worrying herself sick about} Mike.
sentences.cn: 她太担心迈克了，以致感觉不适。

sentences.en: The average Swede was off sick 27 days last year.
sentences.cn: 去年瑞典人平均休病假27天。

sentences.en: the country had been the sick man of Europe for too long.
sentences.cn: 该国很久以来一直是欧洲的弱国。

sentences.en: The sight of George shedding crocodile tears made me sick.
sentences.cn: 看到乔治假慈悲，我感到恶心。

sentences.en: What will happen to the business if you fall sick (= become ill ) or die?
sentences.cn: 假如你生病或是去世了，公司怎么办？

sentences.en: When we are off sick, we only receive half pay.
sentences.cn: 我们请病假的时候只能拿一半薪水。

厌恶的；病态的；不舒服；渴望的；恶心的

trans.tran_cn: 恶心的，晕船，不舒服的，腻烦的，生病的
trans.tran_en: suffering from a disease or illness
